title: Aminé - Charmander (2021)
description: In the 2021 music video "Charmander" by Aminé, the artist retreats to a secluded cabin in the woods, symbolizing a quest for peace and introspection away from the pressures of fame. The video is characterized by a warm, earthy color palette and natural light, capturing the tranquil beauty of the forest setting. The nostalgic reference to Pokémon through the title "Charmander" adds a whimsical contrast to the mature themes of self-discovery and isolation.

title: Oddworld x Souly - wzf / maybach (2024)
description: The music video for "WZF / Maybach" by Oddworld x Souly is a visually striking and dynamic production. The video features high-energy performances and a mix of urban and futuristic aesthetics. With vibrant colors and fast-paced edits, the visual storytelling complements the rhythm and intensity of the track. The artists are showcased in various locations, including industrial backdrops and sleek, modern settings, adding to the video's edgy and stylish vibe. The direction creatively blends elements of hip-hop culture with innovative visual effects, making it a captivating watch from start to finish.

title: Valentino Khan - Deep Down Low (2016)
description: One of the weirdest music videos you'll ever watch. We don't recommend watching while high. Actually scratch that. Even better when high. Fever, hallucinogens, or the hypnotic beat at the track make his nightmares increasingly bizarre. In the restaurant, dancing facial features and tentacles sprouting from a waitress's eyes push him to flee the surreal scene.
tags: WOMAN | RESTAURANT | INTERIOR | HORROR | OCTOPUS | TENTACLES | SQUID
technique_tags: Altered state | Drug trip | Magical realism

title: A$AP Rocky - L$D (2015)
description: Shot entirely in Tokyo, L$D borrows heavily from Gaspar Noé’s 2009 psychedelic fantasy film Enter the Void (which, if you ask Noé, also inspired Kanye West’s 2010 music video “All of the Lights”).
technique_tags: Altered state | Drug trip | Light Flash | Towards camera | Tracking
